line.originaltext: 1 cup cucumber - peeled, seeded and chopped

line.originaltext: In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta until al dente, rinse under cold water and drain.
line.annotation: create_tool(t0, "large pot of salted boiling water")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine the pasta, mayonnaise and mix well.

line.originaltext: Drizzle oil and vinegar over top and toss.
